item.itemfilters.xor.description: One of two filters must match, but not both
item.itemfilters.item_group.description: Use Item Group / Creative Tab ID
item.itemfilters.id_regex.description: Checks item ID with regular expressions
item.itemfilters.block.description: Checks of item is a block
item.itemfilters.strong_nbt.description: Matches if entire NBT is equal
item.itemfilters.weak_nbt.description: Matches if only specified part of NBT is present
item.itemfilters.custom.description: Requires a mod or a script, usually KubeJS, to make it work
itemfilters.help_text.variants:
Tab, Scroll Wheel, Cursor Up/Down: adjust highlight
Enter: select highlighted
itemfilters.help_text.nbt:
NBT String
▶ e.g. { text:"hello", value: 1, active: true }
itemfilters.help_text.regex:
Regular Expression
 Matched against the item ID
▶ e.g. "^minecraft:" matches all vanilla items
itemfilters.help_text.max_count:
Maximum Stack Size
▶ May also include relational operators, e.g. "<64" or ">=16"
itemfilters.help_text.damage:
Item Damage
▶ May also include relational operators, e.g. "<10" or ">=5"
 and optionally by percentage, e.g. ">50%"
